name: node-lucene
description: Node.js API and bindings to apache lucene

scripts.test-js: npm run clean && npm run build && node dist/spec
scripts.docs: npm run docs-readme-toc && npm run docs-api
scripts.docs-api: rm -rf docs && typedoc  --ignoreCompilerErrors --theme markdown --out docs --readme none --excludeNotExported src/index.ts
scripts.prettier: npx prettier  --write --arrow-parens avoid --parser typescript --use-tabs false --no-semi true --single-quote true --tab-width 2 --trailing-comma none --end-of-line lf --prose-wrap preserve --print-width 120  --jsx-bracket-same-line true "src/**/*.ts*" "spec/**/*.ts*"
scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run prettier && npm run build && npm test && npm run test-js && npm run docs
scripts.all-publish: npm run all && npm version patch && npm publish

author: Sebastian Gurin
